Thanks for the uncensored version! I'll def. seed this.
Excellent, I hope this is the one with the full sceene with Chun Li in the shower! I got the movie on vhs but that about sez it all.
can someone help me burn this to dvd tried said unexcepted foemat help me i love this movie.

this movie is MFV file....
why not AVI?

why make things hard when you can do it the easy way?

To ^umarnawazkhan^ - It needs to be an .mkv file because it has mutiple language packs to choose from. .mkv files are better and more advanced from what I've heard though this will be the first time I've played one after I download this.

Just download VLC Player, it's free and plays just about every audio and video file, even .mkv videa files.

Mega thx to the uploader for this.
Always seed...

AWESOME UPLOAD! I remember buying this on Video when I was in school, it's easily the best video game movie of all time, fantastic stuff and it downloaded so fast, I shall seed for ages and help spread the manga love!!!!
how do i use the english language on this? it just automatically has it in japanese and english subtitles, is there any way i can use english dubbing? let me know any help would be great, thanks.
Thank you very much, great upload !

Um, how do I get the English dub?

I don't want to read subtitles if I can watch it in English
im asking the same the same thing how can i get english dub? im pretty stumped..
oh hey i found it, use VLC player and click on audio at the top then audio track then you should see track 1 and track 2 pick the track its not on and its english

Seed please, I will seed for days if I get this.
been on 24hours still no seeders :
Dis is amazing, it's in so many languages and the music changes to the original music made for that version also ;) This is amazing for such a size! Quality is ace also!

great upload

But the English subtitles are wrong, got several names mixed up (ie Bison is named as Vega, vega as Balrog and Balrog as Bison)

pther than that It's awesome

@cazza09
In the original Japanese that's how the names are. The English games shuffled the names for some reason, and of course the movie followed suit.
